content:
Summarized outline:

1. Definitions in the Act:
a) Classified national security information
b) Controlling holding
c) Covered holding
d) Covered transaction
e) Critical infrastructure
f) Entity
g) Executive department and agency
h) Foreign adversary
i) Holding
j) ICTS covered holding entity
k) Information and communications technology products or services
l) Mitigation measure
m) Person
n) Relevant executive department and agency heads
o) Relevant committees of Congress
p) Secretary
q) Transaction

Summary of text: This Act outlines definitions related to national security, including terms associated with foreign adversaries, transactions, holdings, and entities in the context of information and communications technology products or services. It also defines relevant executive departments, agencies, and committees of Congress.
